basic.Peptide Name: Peptide BmKn2 (Biologically active peptide 4; NDBP-5.1; Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=0.6 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus(MIC=8 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=5 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=1.5 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=21.3 µg/ml).
